neg review: Would have been good to have coffee facilities.. there was tea provided, but no coffee.

pos review: Excellent location, large apartment, quiet, comfy bed,
neg review: Slightly tired decor that needs updating.

pos review: Everything was perfect.  Very cute,  clean apartment. Nearby parking garage.  Right by the center
Everything - the location was very central, the quality of the apartment was outstanding, and the entire experience was trouble free.
neg review: Nothing to add here. The place is a gem.

pos review: Philippe was very friendly, the apartment was in the middle of the city, I strongly recommend the place.
neg review: There could have been more lights installed in the bathroom.
The toilet and the bathroom are separated and there is no sink in the toilet.

pos review: Location is ideal, in the very center of Brussels. Friendly host. Nice modern room.
